This tool is importantly powered by Birdata and BirdMark: the creators of this tool would like to acknowledge the efforts of bird banding and bird monitoring volunteers across Australia, whose data collection over decades has enabled this project to present dynamic information on seabird, waterbird and shorebird populations.
